channel.title: Compile
channel.description: Hello i need some help and its saying when i compile its saying The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . . Can anyone help me...

item.title: Compile

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

get a diff compiler.

item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @i_am_an_elf i am an elf
item.description:
@i_am_an_elf wrote:

[quote=“pu123 5k1ll3, post:3, topic:172383”]try using this

@echo off
COLOR 09
title yourservernamehere *.java complier
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java" server
pause

depending ont he java version you may need to change the jdk from 1.6.0_02 to 1.6.0_03
and change yourservernamehere to the name of your server[/quote]

Thats prolly not gonna work if he didn’t set the path.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @pu123_5k1ll3 pu123 5k1ll3
item.description:
@pu123_5k1ll3 wrote:

try using this

@echo off
COLOR 09
title yourservernamehere *.java complier
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java" server
pause

depending ont he java version you may need to change the jdk from 1.6.0_02 to 1.6.0_03
and change yourservernamehere to the name of your server

Read full topic
